name: FRED
talkMsg: How could you lose the spaceship? It's giant.
lookMsg: He sort of looks like a newt.

name: MECHANIC
talkMsg: If I was working on your spaceship, you would have a work order. No order, no work.
lookMsg: A crusty mechanic organizing his garage.

NAME: PILOT
talkMsg: I can't let you hitch a ride, you're clearly unprepared for the travel.

name: GEORGE
talkMsg: Fred told me you were searching for a lost spaceship. We have a new access code 24601.
lookMsg: He looks significantly less newt like than his brother. Maybe he got better.

name: SALESMAN
talkMsg: Do you have a NUMBER? No number, no ticket. According to the rules I just made up.
lookMsg: A bored employee that appears to have previously worked at the DMV.

name: EMPLOYEE
talkMsg: You're not getting on this flight without a ticket.
